title: Teapot And Cover, 1980
creditline: Museum purchase with General Acquisitions Endowment
description: Cast and assembled. Teapot triangular in general shape; body of two-tri-angular congruent plinth separated by smaller square section.  At point of triangles is applied spout, lozenge shaped in cross-section, with right angle bend to form pouring lip.  Upper triangle of body applied with three-tube trap handle and with circular inset cover.  All glazed in mottled blue and reddish-mauve.

tombstone.epitaph:
Teapot And Cover, 1980.
1980. porcelain, glaze. Museum purchase with General Acquisitions Endowment. 1981-26-1-a,b.
